item.title: Floating water bridge
item.description: In this video I show you how a water bridge or water thread is made using high voltage. I talk about the mysteries related to the phenomenon.

media:content.media:title: Floating water bridge
media:content.media:description: In this video I show you how a water bridge or water thread is made using high voltage. I talk about the mysteries related to the phenomenon.

item.title: Color changing glass
item.description: I show you what CFL color changing glass looks like under different lighting. I show you how to determine why something has a certain color.

media:content.media:title: Color changing glass
media:content.media:description: I show you what CFL color changing glass looks like under different lighting. I show you how to determine why something has a certain color.

item.title: How does quantum locking work?
item.description: In this video I use a type II superconductor to perform a quantum locking demonstration using YCBO (Yttrium barium copper oxide). I then explain in depth how superconductors and quantum locking (Flux pinning) works.

media:content.media:title: How does quantum locking work?
media:content.media:description: In this video I use a type II superconductor to perform a quantum locking demonstration using YCBO (Yttrium barium copper oxide). I then explain in depth how superconductors and quantum locking (Flux pinning) works.

item.title: The first fire umbrella
item.description: In this video I show you the world's first fire umbrella. The goal of this umbrella is to vaporize the rain before it hits you. This is a follow up to the air umbrella Kickstarter dubunk video based on audience suggestions.

media:content.media:title: The first fire umbrella
media:content.media:description: In this video I show you the world's first fire umbrella. The goal of this umbrella is to vaporize the rain before it hits you. This is a follow up to the air umbrella Kickstarter dubunk video based on audience suggestions.

item.title: I try to climb a wall with nano tape!
item.description: I try out gecko tape (AKA nano tape, alien tape etc.) to see if it can be used to climb walls like a Gecko.
